rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0001
rows.name:
Hey, Mei!
What's wrong?

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0002
rows.name: Are you not feeling well?

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0003
rows.name:
Mei!
What's the matter?

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0004
rows.name: Are you not feeling well?

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0005
rows.name:
Mei, is something wrong?
Are you feeling unwell?

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0006
rows.name:
Yo, Mei!
What are you up to?

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0007
rows.name: You feeling sick or something?

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0008
rows.name: Mei~? It's morning already~

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0009
rows.name: Come on, time to get up~!

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0010
rows.name: ...Is something the matter?

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0011
rows.name: Mei isn't waking up...

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0012
rows.name: Mei?

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0013
rows.name:
She did mention she's
not a morning person,
so she might still be asleep.

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0014
rows.name: ...Should I go wake her up?

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0015
rows.name: Yeah, please do.

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0016
rows.name: Yeah, I'd appreciate it.

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0017
rows.name: Yes, would you mind?

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0018
rows.name: Alright then, if ya don't mind.

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0019
rows.name:
...Nngh?
What's...going on...?

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0020
rows.name:
I woke her up, but
she still seems to be half-asleep...

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0021
rows.name:
Ugh... Can you keep it down?
I'm trying to sleep here...

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0022
rows.name:
How long are you planning to sleep?
It's morning already!

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0023
rows.name: We need to get ready to go.

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0024
rows.name:
How much longer do you plan to sleep?
It's morning, you know.

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0025
rows.name: Hurry up and get ready to go, will ya?

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0026
rows.name: Just how long do you plan to sleep?

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0027
rows.name:
The sun is already up.
Prepare to depart, at once.

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0028
rows.name: How long ya gonna keep sleeping?

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0029
rows.name:
It's morning already, ya know?
Hurry up and get ready to go!

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0030
rows.name:
...Huh? Morning?
Oh, I see...

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0031
rows.name:
Well then, I'll sleep a bit more...
Good night.

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0032
rows.name:
Hey, come on!
Why are you going back to sleep!?

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0033
rows.name:
No, seriously,
why are you still trying to sleep!

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0034
rows.name:
Mei,
I'm telling you to get up...

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0035
rows.name:
"Good night"? That's not it!
I'm telling you to wake up!

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0036
rows.name:
But it's only morning, right?
There's loads of time until
tomorrow morning...

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0037
rows.name:
I didn't get to bed until dawn...
So just let me be.

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0038
rows.name: What should I say to Mei?

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0039
rows.name:
Mei, why are you so terrible at getting
up?

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0040
rows.name: Why were you up so late?

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0041
rows.name: What should I ask her...?

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0042
rows.name: Mei, what is it with you and mornings?

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0043
rows.name: What kept you up so late?

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0044
rows.name: What should I ask her...?

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0045
rows.name:
How come you're such a weakling
when it comes to mornings?

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0046
rows.name: Why were you so late to bed?

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0047
rows.name: What should I ask her...?

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0048
rows.name:
How come you're such a lazybones in
the morning?

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0049
rows.name: What kept you up so late?

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0050
rows.name: Uh?

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0051
rows.name:
That's because I am from
a clan of the night ＜Nacht Clan＞,
isn't that obvious?

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0053
rows.name:
Nacht Clan!
So cool!

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0054
rows.name:
Does something happen
when you're exposed to sunlight?

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0055
rows.name:
Hmm... When I'm exposed to sunlight,
I lose my power and might disappear...

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0056
rows.name: Wow! Awesome!

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0057
rows.name: That's incredible!

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0058
rows.name:
Oh, and by the way,
if you don't let me get
back to sleep...

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0059
rows.name:
The black-robed spirit ＜Schwarzgeist＞
that sleeps within me...

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0060
rows.name:
...might go berserk,
so you should be careful...

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0061
rows.name: A Schwarzgeist!?

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0062
rows.name: Go riot?

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0063
rows.name:
That's right. As for me,
to avoid that,
I need to get more sleep.

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0064
rows.name: Well then, good night.

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0065
rows.name:
...I already told you no!
Come on, we're leaving!

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0066
rows.name:
...I already said no!
Come on, we're taking off!

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0067
rows.name:
...I said no.
Now, we're departing.

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0068
rows.name:
I don't care what ya say, just get up!
We're leaving right away!

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0069
rows.name: ...Tch, didn't work, huh?

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0070
rows.name:
...I was at a secret
midnight gathering.

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0071
rows.name: A secret gathering?

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0072
rows.name:
That's right.
We were summoning dark powers
with my fellow cultists...

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0073
rows.name:
...I get it,
you were just having a girls' night,
chatting with friends.

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0074
rows.name:
N-no, that's not it!
I told you it was a secret gathering!

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0075
rows.name:
Hikari-chan is saying
otherwise, you know?

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0076
rows.name:
She says you were just hanging
out and chatting with everyone...

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0077
rows.name:
Why did she have to rat me out!?
That blabbermouth...

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0078
rows.name: ...So what were you all talking about?

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0079
rows.name: That's none of your business!

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0080
rows.name: ※削除

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0081
rows.name:
Let's see...
she says you were talking
about favorite desserts.

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0082
rows.name: I said don't spill it!

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0083
rows.name:
Hey, Hikari!
Or wait,
is that Homura right now?

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0084
rows.name:
Ugh, whatever,
I don't care which one you are,
just stop it already!

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0085
rows.name:
...If you don't get up now,
I'll tell everyone everything,
you know?

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0086
rows.name: That's what Hikari-chan is saying.

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0087
rows.name:
Aaah, wait, stop!
Okay, I'm getting up!

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0088
rows.name: Please don't say anything more!
